EmailTemplate.description: COMMERCIAL Use when there is a GTS block on a part originating in Canada - Request the customer to provide Canadian End use form for Export Permit application.
EmailTemplate.name: Export License/Permit info required-Shipment originating in Canada
EmailTemplate.subject: Export License Info End Use Certificate Required {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
We have determined that this order requires a Canadian Export Permit for part number(s) <Enter PN here>.
Please populate and return the attached End Use Statement on your Company letterhead within 5 days. Delays in submittal may result in delivery delays.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
